examples: We condemn the racism in South Africa

definitions.text: declare or judge unfit for use or habitation
examples: The building was condemned by the inspector

definitions.text: compel or force into a particular state or activity
examples: His devotion to his sick wife condemned him to a lonely existence

definitions.text: pronounce a sentence on (somebody) in a court of law
examples: He was condemned to ten years in prison
the county condemned the land to build a highway
